trans-unit.source: Represents a parameter to a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> and optionally, its mapping to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column.
trans-unit.target: 表示参数传递给<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>和 （可选） 到其映射<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>列。

trans-unit.source: For more information on parameters, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数的详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>的参数。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property is not set to a valid <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该属性未设置为有效<xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示参数是只可输入，输出、 双向参数还是存储的过程返回值参数。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> is output, and execution of the associated <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> does not return a value, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>是输出，而执行的关联<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>不返回一个值，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>包含一个 null 值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: `Output`, `InputOut`, and `ReturnValue` parameters returned by calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> cannot be accessed until you call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Dispose%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: `Output``InputOut`，和`ReturnValue`参数返回通过调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>无法访问，直到你调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Dispose%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Close%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Input" name="Input" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Input" name="Input" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property is not set to one of the valid <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 该属性未设置为一个有效<xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter accepts null values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示参数是否接受 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Null values are handled using the <xref:System.DBNull> class.
trans-unit.target: 处理 null 值使用<xref:System.DBNull>类。</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if null values are accepted; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果接受 null 值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的名称<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions] Gets or sets the maximum number of digits used to represent the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.1 和更高版本中受支持] 获取或设置用于表示的数字的最大数<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits used to represent the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示的数字的最大数<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Resets the **DbType** property to its original settings.
trans-unit.target: 重置**DbType**为其原始设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到的小数位数<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>得到解决。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The number of decimal places to which <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数数<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>得到解决。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的最大大小，以字节为单位，列中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The Size property is used for binary and string types.
trans-unit.target: 大小属性用于二进制和字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the Size property refers to the number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 对于非字符串数据类型和 ANSI 字符串数据，大小属性引用的字节数。

trans-unit.source: For Unicode string data, Size refers to the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字符串数据大小是指的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The count for strings does not include the terminating character.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的计数不包括结尾的字符。

trans-unit.source: For variable-length data types, Size describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server.
trans-unit.target: 对于可变长度数据类型，大小描述数据传输到服务器的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a Unicode string value, Size could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于 Unicode 字符串值，大小无法用来限制发送到服务器以首先一百个字符的数据量。

trans-unit.source: For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of Size.
trans-unit.target: 对于双向和输出参数和返回值，必须设置的值的大小。

trans-unit.source: This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed.
trans-unit.target: 这不是必需的输入参数，并执行参数化的语句时如果未显式指定的参数的实际大小从推断设置，则该值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.DbType%2A> and Size properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.DbType%2A>并且可以通过设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value%2A>推断的参数的大小属性</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to specify them.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不需要指定它们。

trans-unit.source: However, they are not exposed in <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它们未公开在<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>属性设置。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, Size does not contain inferred value after statement execution.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果已推断出参数的大小，大小不包含推断的值在语句执行后。

trans-unit.source: For fixed length data types, the value of Size is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 对于固定的长度数据类型，则忽略大小的值。

trans-unit.source: It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server.
trans-unit.target: 它可以检索用于信息说明，并返回最大传输到服务器参数的值时，提供程序使用的字节数。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the value supplied for a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> exceeds the specified Size, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> will contain the specified value, truncated to the Size of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果为<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>超过指定的大小，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>将包含指定的值，截断至<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>的大小</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>的</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>值的大小提供

trans-unit.source: For parameters of type `DbType`.`String`, the value of Size is length in Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 类型参数的`DbType`。`String`，大小的值是以 Unicode 字符为单位的长度。

trans-unit.source: For parameters of type `DbType`.`Xml`, Size is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 类型参数的`DbType`。`Xml`，将忽略大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: 以字节为单位，列中数据的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 根据参数值，默认值进行推断。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and used for loading or returning the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置映射到的源列的名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>和用于加载或返回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When SourceColumn is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the SourceColumn name.
trans-unit.target: 当 SourceColumn 设置为一个空字符串之外的任何内容时，将从具有 SourceColumn 名称的列中检索参数的值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A> is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A>设置为`Input`，值取自<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A> is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A>设置为`Output`，从数据源中获取的值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A> of `InputOutput` is a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A>的`InputOutput`是这两者的组合。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use the SourceColumn property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用 SourceColumn 属性的详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column mapped to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 映射到源列的名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取一个值，该值指示源列是否可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: This allows <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.
trans-unit.target: 这允许<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>以正确地生成 Update 语句为 null 的列。

trans-unit.source: SourceColumnNullMapping is used by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 SourceColumnNullMapping<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>时处理可以为 null 的列正确生成更新命令。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Generally, use of SourceColumnNullMapping is limited to developers inheriting from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，使用 SourceColumnNullMapping 受到开发人员从<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>继承

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>使用此属性来确定源列是否可以为 null，并将此属性设置为`true`是否可以为 null，和`false`如果它不是。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> is generating its Update statement, it examines the SourceColumnNullMapping for each parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>是生成其 Update 语句，检查每个参数 SourceColumnNullMapping。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the property is `true`, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` If SourceColumnNullMapping for the field is `false`, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性是`true`，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>生成 WHERE 子句，如下所示 （在此查询表达式中，"FieldName"表示的字段名称）︰``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ```如果 SourceColumnNullMapping 字段是`false`，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>生成以下 WHERE 子句︰``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ```此外，@IsNull_FieldName如果源字段包含 null 值和 0，如果它不包含 1。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.
trans-unit.target: 此机制允许 SQL Server 中的一个性能优化，并提供的可以在多个提供程序的通用代码。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the source column is nullable; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果源列可以为 null;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果它不是。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> to use when you load <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref>加载<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value*>时要使用

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> during an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> operation to determine whether the parameter value is set to `Current` or `Original`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>期间<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>操作，以确定是否将参数值设置为`Current`或`Original`。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This lets primary keys be updated.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以更新主键。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to the version of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> used by the `DataRow.Item` property, or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为的新版<xref:System.Data.DataRow>由`DataRow.Item`属性，或<xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.DataRow>对象。</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property is not set to one of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 该属性未设置为其中一个<xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the precision of numeric parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指示的数值参数的精度。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter>接口。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Precision%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Precision%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Precision%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits used to represent the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> property of a data provider <xref uid="langword_csharp_Parameter" name="Parameter" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示的数字的最大数<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>数据提供程序的属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_Parameter" name="Parameter" href=""></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which indicates that a data provider sets the precision for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0，它表示数据提供程序设置的精度<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Scale%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Scale%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter>接口。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Scale%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Scale%2A>。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataParameter.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of decimal places to which <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter.Value"></xref> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数数<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter.Value"></xref>得到解决。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置参数的值。

trans-unit.source: For input parameters, the value is bound to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> that is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 用于输入参数的值绑定到<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>，发送到服务器。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> and after the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 对于输出参数和返回值参数，该数值将在完成<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>后<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>已关闭。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: When you send a null parameter value to the server, you must specify <xref:System.DBNull>, not null.
trans-unit.target: 当你向服务器发送 null 参数值时，必须指定<xref:System.DBNull>，而不是 null。</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The null value in the system is an empty object that has no value.
trans-unit.target: 系统中的 null 值是一个空的对象具有任何值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DBNull> is used to represent null values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DBNull>用于表示 null 值。</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序指定数据库类型，绑定的值转换为该类型时提供程序将数据发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序尝试将任何类型的值的转换，如果它支持<xref:System.IConvertible>接口。</xref:System.IConvertible>

trans-unit.source: Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的类型不兼容的值，可能会导致转换错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.DbType%2A> property can be inferred by setting the Value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.DbType%2A>属性可以推断出的值设置。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Value property is overwritten by `DbDataAdapter.Update`.
trans-unit.target: Value 属性会被覆盖`DbDataAdapter.Update`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>的参数的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。
